title: “I burned her with boiling water inside the college.” A brand new resolution within the incident of the scholar “Caroline” in Giza – Masrawy – Masrawy
text:
05:30 p.m
Thursday, June 13, 2024
Books – Ramadan Younes:
The Omraniya Misdemeanor Court docket in Giza postponed the primary session of the trial of “Najwa A.,” an administrative affairs employee at a personal college in Faisal, accused of pouring boiling water on her face ” Caroline Marks,” the sixth. grade pupil whereas she was at school, till the subsequent session June 26, to announce the official fee.
Rifaat Saadan, the lawyer of the scholar “Caroline,” submitted a civil declare to the Omraniya Misdemeanor Court docket for an quantity of 100,000 kilos as non permanent civil compensation for the injury his consumer suffered from the capturing on her physique.
Earlier, the Public Treasury referred the accused worker to trial earlier than the misdemeanor court docket on allegations of unintentional harm as a consequence of pouring boiling water on the sufferer pupil.
After listening to her statements, the investigative authorities launched an worker in administrative affairs at Dar Al Hanan Personal Faculty within the Faisal district of Giza. After the plaintiff was accused of wrongful harm.
“Marcos” stated in statements to Masrawy that the investigating authorities on the Omraniya Prosecutor’s Workplace heard the statements of the principal of the college and his daughter and his daughter, the scholar “Caroline,” about how she suffered burns within the second grade contained in the schoolyard. This occurred after sizzling water was poured on her face and proper shoulder “The employee stated she did not imply it,” in response to Mark, the scholar’s father.
“Marcos” defined in statements to “Masrawy” that he filed a grievance towards the college earlier than the Administrative Affairs of the Ministry of Schooling, explaining that the Giza training administration, when speaking with him, strain to not settle for the occasion and to punish the one that dedicated the crime, “They may all be accountable, and the proper of a woman is not going to go away.” In keeping with the lady’s father.
Comply with Mark; He wrote a report within the Omraniya Division of Giza, No. 3038, of 2024, Omraniya Administrative Workplace, during which he accuses an worker of injuring his daughter whereas she was inside, after his daughter obtained the required therapy in a personal hospital.
The primary digital medical report revealed that the scholar, “Caroline,” suffered burns on the face and proper shoulder. The case was introduced to a plastic surgeon, who determined that the therapy interval can be roughly 3 weeks till did the burns recover from.
